remedies.Apple_Scab: Apply fungicide sprays containing captan or myclobutanil. Remove fallen leaves.
remedies.Apple_Black_Rot: Prune dead or infected branches. Apply copper-based fungicide.
remedies.Apple_Cedar_Rust: Remove nearby juniper trees. Apply fungicide in spring.
remedies.Apple_Healthy: No treatment needed. Continue regular care and monitoring.
remedies.Blueberry_Healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain proper watering and mulching.
remedies.Cherry_Powdery_Mildew: Apply sulfur-based fungicide. Improve air circulation.
remedies.Cherry_Healthy: No treatment needed. Continue regular pruning and care.
remedies.Corn_Cercospora_Leaf_Spot: Use resistant varieties. Apply fungicide if severe.
remedies.Corn_Common_Rust: Plant resistant hybrids. Apply foliar fungicide if needed.
remedies.Corn_Northern_Leaf_Blight: Use resistant varieties. Rotate crops annually.
remedies.Corn_Healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain proper fertilization.
remedies.Grape_Black_Rot: Remove infected fruit. Apply fungicide before bloom.
remedies.Grape_Esca_Black_Measles: Prune infected wood. No effective chemical control.
remedies.Grape_Leaf_Blight: Apply fungicide sprays. Remove infected leaves.
remedies.Grape_Healthy: No treatment needed. Continue regular vineyard management.
remedies.Orange_Citrus_Greening: Remove infected trees. Control psyllid insects.
remedies.Peach_Bacterial_Spot: Apply copper sprays. Use resistant varieties.
remedies.Peach_Healthy: No treatment needed. Regular pruning recommended.
remedies.Pepper_Bacterial_Spot: Use disease-free seeds. Apply copper-based bactericide.
remedies.Pepper_Healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain proper spacing.
remedies.Potato_Early_Blight: Apply fungicide. Remove infected plant debris.
remedies.Potato_Late_Blight: Apply fungicide immediately. Destroy infected plants.
remedies.Potato_Healthy: No treatment needed. Hill soil around plants.
remedies.Raspberry_Healthy: No treatment needed. Prune old canes after harvest.
remedies.Soybean_Healthy: No treatment needed. Rotate crops for best results.
remedies.Squash_Powdery_Mildew: Apply neem oil or sulfur fungicide. Improve airflow.
remedies.Strawberry_Healthy: No treatment needed. Mulch and water properly.
remedies.Tomato_Bacterial_Spot: Use copper sprays. Avoid overhead watering.
